titleInfo.title: Opening of Dave Cook Sporting Goods Store, Denver, Colo.

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#1034 Cooks Sporting Goods." Handwritten on back of photograph: "Opening of Dave Cook Sporting Goods, 1601 Larimer St store, 1936, Standing from left to right: Nate Bernstone, Dave Cook, Jane Cook, Herb Cook, Belle Smernoff."

mods.abstract: The staff of Dave Cook Sporting Goods stand in front of the counter next to baskets of flowers, celebrating the grand opening of the store at 1601 Larimer Street, Denver, Colorado. From left to right: Nate Bernstone, Dave Cook, Jane Cook, Herb Cook, and Belle Smernoff. In 1924, Dave and Max Cook went into the sporting goods business, operating the first major sports store in Colorado.
mods.note: Appears in, ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' By Dr. Jeanne Abrams on page 55.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
